tools.name: JSON Formatter
tools.description: Format, validate, and minify JSON with syntax highlighting and error detection.
tools.searchDesc: json formatter validator minify prettify syntax highlighting parse stringify lint
tools.shortDescription: Format and validate JSON data instantly
tools.longDescription: A powerful JSON formatter that validates, formats, minifies, and highlights syntax errors in JSON data. Supports large files and provides detailed error messages.

tools.name: API Tester
tools.description: Test REST APIs with custom headers, authentication, and request body formatting.
tools.searchDesc: api tester rest http client postman curl request response headers authentication
tools.shortDescription: Test REST APIs with custom headers and auth
tools.longDescription: A comprehensive API testing tool that allows you to send HTTP requests with custom headers, body, and authentication. Perfect for testing REST APIs during development.
features: All HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

tools.name: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
tools.description: Encode and decode Base64 strings and files with support for various formats.
tools.searchDesc: base64 encoder decoder encode decode string file image binary conversion
tools.shortDescription: Encode and decode Base64 data instantly
tools.longDescription: Convert text, images, and files to Base64 encoding and decode Base64 strings back to their original format. Supports all file types.

tools.name: Regex Tester
tools.description: Test regular expressions with real-time matching, explanation, and performance analysis.
tools.searchDesc: regex regular expression tester matcher pattern validation test string match
tools.shortDescription: Test regex patterns with live matching
tools.longDescription: A powerful regex testing tool that provides real-time pattern matching, detailed explanations, and performance analysis for regular expressions.

tools.name: Hash Generator
tools.description: Generate MD5, SHA1, SHA256, and other cryptographic hashes for text and files.
tools.searchDesc: hash generator md5 sha1 sha256 sha512 checksum crypto cryptographic digest
tools.longDescription: Generate various cryptographic hashes (MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512) for text strings and files. Perfect for data integrity verification.

tools.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
tools.description: Encode and decode URLs and query parameters safely for web applications.
tools.searchDesc: url encoder decoder encode decode percent encoding query parameters uri
tools.longDescription: Encode URLs and query parameters for safe transmission and decode percent-encoded URLs back to readable format.

tools.name: Semantic Code Diff
tools.description: Compare code semantically to understand logical changes beyond text differences.
tools.searchDesc: semantic diff code comparison ast abstract syntax tree logical changes refactor
tools.shortDescription: Understand code changes at a logical level
tools.longDescription: Advanced code comparison tool that analyzes semantic differences rather than just text changes. Shows refactoring, variable renames, and logical modifications.

tools.name: Minimal Reproducible Example Generator
tools.description: Automatically reduce large code samples to minimal examples that reproduce errors.
tools.searchDesc: mre minimal reproducible example generator code reduction bug isolation debug
tools.shortDescription: Create minimal examples for bug reports
tools.longDescription: Automatically reduces large, complex code to the smallest possible example that still reproduces the issue. Perfect for creating clear bug reports.

tools.name: Dependency Risk Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze package dependencies for security, license, and maintenance risks.
tools.searchDesc: dependency risk analyzer security license vulnerabilities package npm requirements
tools.shortDescription: Assess security and license risks in dependencies
tools.longDescription: Comprehensive analysis of project dependencies including security vulnerabilities, license compatibility, maintenance status, and bundle size impact.

tools.name: API Contract Diff
tools.description: Compare OpenAPI/GraphQL schemas and generate migration guides for breaking changes.
tools.searchDesc: api contract diff openapi swagger graphql schema migration breaking changes
tools.shortDescription: Track API changes and migration paths
tools.longDescription: Compare API specifications to identify breaking changes and generate detailed migration guides for clients and servers.

tools.name: Test Case Generator
tools.description: Auto-generate unit tests from code docstrings, function signatures, and examples.
tools.searchDesc: test generator unit testing jest pytest mocha docstring function signature automation
tools.longDescription: Create comprehensive unit tests automatically by analyzing function signatures, docstrings, and usage patterns. Supports multiple testing frameworks.

tools.name: Mock API Generator
tools.description: Create realistic mock APIs with latency simulation and scenario scripting.
tools.searchDesc: mock api generator fake data server simulation rest graphql endpoint testing
tools.longDescription: Create mock API servers with realistic data, configurable latency, and error scenarios. Perfect for frontend development and testing.

tools.name: Docker Image Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze Docker images for size optimization and security vulnerabilities.
tools.searchDesc: docker image analyzer container optimization size layers security vulnerabilities
tools.shortDescription: Optimize Docker images and improve security
tools.longDescription: Comprehensive Docker image analysis including layer breakdown, size optimization suggestions, and security vulnerability detection.

tools.name: Tailwind CSS Optimizer
tools.description: Optimize Tailwind classes, remove duplicates, and suggest component extractions.
tools.searchDesc: tailwind css optimizer utility classes component extraction purge duplicate removal
tools.shortDescription: Optimize Tailwind classes and extract components
tools.longDescription: Analyze and optimize Tailwind CSS usage by removing duplicates, suggesting component extractions, and minimizing class lists.

tools.name: Secret Scanner
tools.description: Detect accidentally exposed secrets, API keys, and sensitive data in code.
tools.searchDesc: secret scanner api keys tokens passwords sensitive data detection security leak
tools.shortDescription: Find exposed secrets and sensitive data
tools.longDescription: Scan code repositories and files for accidentally exposed secrets, API keys, passwords, and other sensitive information.

tools.name: SQL Query Visualizer
tools.description: Visualize SQL execution plans and get optimization recommendations.
tools.searchDesc: sql query visualizer execution plan optimization explain analyzer performance
tools.longDescription: Transform SQL execution plans into visual diagrams and provide concrete optimization suggestions for better query performance.

tools.name: YAML Converter
tools.description: Convert between YAML, JSON, TOML, and other configuration formats.
tools.searchDesc: yaml converter json toml configuration format conversion parser validator
tools.longDescription: Convert configuration files between YAML, JSON, TOML, and other formats while preserving structure and comments where possible.

tools.name: CSS Minifier
tools.description: Minify and optimize CSS code for production while preserving functionality.
tools.searchDesc: css minifier optimizer compression production build size reduction performance
tools.longDescription: Compress CSS files by removing whitespace, comments, and unnecessary code while maintaining full functionality and browser compatibility.

tools.name: JWT Token Decoder
tools.description: Decode, validate, and analyze JSON Web Tokens with security insights.
tools.searchDesc: jwt token decoder json web token validation security claims payload header
tools.longDescription: Decode JSON Web Tokens to inspect headers, payloads, and signatures. Validate token structure and provide security recommendations.

tools.name: Color Palette Extractor
tools.description: Extract dominant colors from images and generate CSS color palettes.
tools.searchDesc: color palette extractor image colors css hex rgb hsl dominant theme generator
tools.shortDescription: Extract colors from images for design
tools.longDescription: Analyze images to extract dominant colors and generate beautiful color palettes with CSS variables and design system recommendations.

tools.name: Markdown Editor
tools.description: Live markdown editor with preview, syntax highlighting, and export options.
tools.searchDesc: markdown editor preview syntax highlighting export html pdf live real-time
tools.longDescription: Feature-rich markdown editor with live preview, syntax highlighting, table editing, and export to multiple formats including HTML and PDF.

tools.name: SVG Optimizer
tools.description: Optimize SVG files by removing unnecessary code and reducing file size.
tools.searchDesc: svg optimizer compression vector graphics optimization file size reduction performance
tools.shortDescription: Optimize SVG files for web performance
tools.longDescription: Compress and optimize SVG files by removing unnecessary metadata, simplifying paths, and reducing file size while maintaining visual quality.

tools.name: cURL Converter
tools.description: Convert cURL commands to code snippets in various programming languages.
tools.searchDesc: curl converter code generator http request javascript python php ruby axios fetch
tools.shortDescription: Convert cURL to code in any language
tools.longDescription: Transform cURL commands into code snippets for JavaScript (fetch/axios), Python (requests), PHP, Ruby, and other popular programming languages.

tools.name: QR Code Generator
tools.description: Generate customizable QR codes for URLs, text, WiFi, and contact information.
tools.searchDesc: qr code generator url text wifi contact vcard customizable logo colors
tools.longDescription: Generate QR codes for various data types including URLs, text, WiFi credentials, and contact information with customizable colors and logos.

tools.name: Password Generator
tools.description: Generate secure passwords with customizable length and character sets.
tools.searchDesc: password generator secure strong random passphrase entropy customizable characters
tools.longDescription: Create cryptographically secure passwords with customizable length, character sets, and complexity requirements. Includes passphrase generation.

tools.name: Text Diff Checker
tools.description: Compare two text documents and highlight differences line by line.
tools.searchDesc: text diff checker comparison difference highlight merge conflict resolution
tools.longDescription: Visual text comparison tool that highlights additions, deletions, and modifications between two documents with line-by-line analysis.

tools.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
tools.description: Generate placeholder text in various formats for design and development.
tools.searchDesc: lorem ipsum generator placeholder text dummy content paragraphs words design
tools.longDescription: Create Lorem Ipsum and other placeholder text in various formats including paragraphs, sentences, words, and custom lengths for design mockups.

tools.name: Time & Space Complexity Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze computational complexity of algorithms with AI-powered insights and optimization suggestions.
tools.searchDesc: time complexity space complexity algorithm analysis big O notation performance optimization computational complexity code analysis
tools.longDescription: Advanced tool that analyzes the time and space complexity of algorithms using AI. Provides detailed Big O notation analysis, optimization suggestions, and performance insights for multiple programming languages.
features: Time complexity analysis (best, average, worst case)

tools.name: Timestamp Converter
tools.description: Convert between Unix timestamps, ISO dates, and human-readable formats.
tools.searchDesc: timestamp converter unix epoch iso date time timezone conversion human readable
tools.longDescription: Convert between Unix timestamps, ISO 8601 dates, and human-readable formats with timezone support and batch processing capabilities.
